overview:
Global Payment Technology offers a complete line of merchant services, Visa, MasterCard & Interac merchant accounts, debit & credit card transaction processing and Debit credit terminals. Whether you need payment processing for retail, restaurant, lodging, e-commerce, mail order / telephone order, or business to business, Wholesale. We can tailor a transaction processing solution to meet your needs. We are full range payment processing service provider, Offering ATM solution, Gift card, Phone Card & Merchant Cash Advance solution EFT (Electronic Fund Transferring), ACH.

WE also provide Payment processing solutions to the merchants categorized as a High Risk Merchant.
